resource: 1001962.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001962.1002622.description=The Toyota Prius received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among compact cars in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2008-2010 Vehicle Dependability StudiesSM. 2010 study based on 52,422 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year old vehicles (2007 model-year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October–December 2009. Your experiences may vary. Visit jdpower.com 1001962.vtc=true 1001962.derived=false 1001962.description=The Toyota Prius received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among compact cars in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2008-2010 Vehicle Dependability StudiesSM. 2010 study based on 52,422 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year old vehicles (2007 model-year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October–December 2009. Your experiences may vary. Visit jdpower.com
